mapper.select: select ${attributebean.category_url_key} as category_url_key ,${attributebean.model_url_key} as model_url_key ,${attributebean.product_url_key} as product_url_key ,${attributebean.attribute1} as attribute1 ,${attributebean.attribute2} as attribute2 ,${attributebean.attribute3} as attribute3 ,${attributebean.attribute4} as attribute4 ,${attributebean.attribute5} as attribute5 ,${attributebean.attribute6} as attribute6 ,${attributebean.attribute7} as attribute7 ,${attributebean.attribute8} as attribute8 ,${attributebean.attribute9} as attribute9 ,${attributebean.attribute14} as attribute14 ,${attributebean.attribute15} as attribute15 ,${attributebean.attribute16} as attribute16 ,${attributebean.attribute17} as attribute17 ,${attributebean.attribute18} as attribute18 ,${attributebean.attribute19} as attribute19 ,${attributebean.attribute20} as attribute20 ,${attributebean.attribute21} as attribute21 ,${attributebean.attribute50} as attribute50 from ${tablename} ${keyword}
mapper.update: update ${tableName} a set a.UpdateFlag = case when a.UpdateFlag = '1' then '3' else '2' end where ${code} in (${codes})
mapper.select: select ${url_key} as url_key ,${category_url_key} as category_url_key ,${m_product_type} as m_product_type ,${m_brand} as m_brand ,${m_model} as m_model ,${m_name} as m_name ,${m_short_description} as m_short_description ,${m_long_description} as m_long_description ,${m_size_type} as m_size_type ,${m_is_unisex} as m_is_unisex ,${m_weight} as m_weight ,${m_is_taxable} as m_is_taxable ,${m_is_effective} as m_is_effective from ${tableName} ${keyword}
select ${code} as code ,${i_sku} as i_sku ,${i_itemcode} as i_itemcode ,${i_size} as i_size ,${i_barcode} as i_barcode ,${i_client_sku} as i_client_sku ,1 as i_active from ${tableName} ${keyword}
mapper.insert: insert into voyageone_cms.cms_mt_feed_attribute( channel_id, attribute_name, attribute_value, create_on) values ( #{channelId}, #{attributeName}, #{attributeValue}, sysdate() )
